message.content:
cs.CR, cs.SE, cs.DC, cs.SI, cs.CY 

This paper deals with the problem of certificate revocation in a public-key infrastructure (PKI) and proposes a novel approach called PKI Safety Net (PKISN). This falls under the category of computer security (cs.CR) as it deals with the security of the PKI system. The paper also discusses the implementation and evaluation of the proposed scheme, which involves software engineering (cs.SE) and distributed computing (cs.DC). The use of publicly accessible logs and Certificate Transparency also involves aspects of system integration (cs.SI) and cybersecurity (cs.CY).
